amendment.description: To require the development of a transportation security plan, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3585 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S9119-9120; text: CR S9119) To require the development of a transportation security plan, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3585 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3585 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feingold.
